fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: All initiatives, policies and legislative files concerning energy and (bio)fuels, including related files concerning regulation, research and development, trading, transport and imports.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Alcogroup specialises in the global production, distribution and trading of a wide range of ethanol grades, with customised blends for food, industry and bio fuel applications.
